title: 100s of SpaceX Starships land on Mars after a 6 month journey. 1000s of Martian colonists being building Mars Base 1
tuit: You want to wake up in the morning and think the future is going to be great - and that’s what being a spacefaring civilization is all about. It’s about believing in the future and thinking that the future will be better than the past. And I can’t think of anything more exciting than going out there and being among the stars

title: June seeks new strategies to save Hannah, while Serena seizes an opportunity.
tuit: June's concerned for Hannah and the other girls' safety, but the commander leading the mission  – who also has a young daughter – immediately puts her at ease. My plan is to bring your daughter home and go home to mine, he says with confidence and kindness.

title: US women's gymnastics team wins historic gold medal at world championships in Liverpool
tuit: The US women’s gymnastics team has claimed a record-breaking sixth world championships gold medal in a row – even without Simone Biles. The team was competing for the first time without the four-time Olympic gold medalist in over a decade, but blew away the competition in the English city of Liverpool with a final score of 166.564.
